er 30, 2013
												This is by far my most favorite Dash game! I really put some time into this game making sure that I accomplish all the goals efficiently. Like all Dash games, they have a simple formula but this one in particular shines the most as there is even a silly story to give you that extra motivation to play. Great for all ages!
